description: Entity and relation extraction schema for historical French company documents

date.description: Date expression in various formats (e.g., '15 mars 1920', 'le trois avril mil neuf cent dix', '1920')

time_period.description: Duration or term expressed in time units (e.g., '99 ans', 'perpétuité', 'trois mois')

organization_name.description: Full or abbreviated name of a company, society, or institution (e.g., 'Société Générale', 'S.A. Métallurgique')

corporate_body.description: Administrative or decision-making body within an organization (e.g., 'conseil d'administration', 'assemblée générale', 'comité de direction')

legal_structure.description: Legal structure or type of an organization (e.g., société anonyme, société coopérative, société en nom collectif)

business_activity.description: Business purpose, mission, or commercial activity (e.g., 'exploitation minière', 'commerce de textiles', 'opérations bancaires et de crédit')

office_type.description: Type of organizational location or headquarters (e.g., 'siège social', 'siège administratif', 'bureau principal')

legal_act.description: Type of legal procedure, action, or deed (e.g., 'acte', 'constitution', 'dissolution', 'liquidation', 'modification des statuts', 'enregistrement au registre du commerce')

deed_number.description: Reference number or identifier for a legal deed (e.g., 'n° 5442', 'n° 2612 de 1920', 'acte 1234')

archive_reference.description: Registry, archive, or filing reference (e.g., 'volume 12, folio 45', 'registre du commerce n° 1234', 'dossier 567')

person_name.description: Full name of a person including first and last names (e.g., 'Jean Dupont', 'Marie Curie', 'Pierre-Auguste Martin')

honorific_title.description: Social title, honorific, or form of address (e.g., 'monsieur', 'm.', 'madame', 'me', 'veuve', 'vve')

occupation.description: Personal profession or trade independent of corporate role (e.g., 'négociant', 'rentier', 'ingénieur', 'avocat')

corporate_position.description: Official title or role within an organization (e.g., 'président', 'administrateur', 'directeur', 'scrutateur', 'commissaire')

number_of_shares.description: Number of shares or parts (e.g., '2 000 actions', '500 parts sociales', 'mille actions')

share_class.description: Type, form, or class of shares (e.g., 'actions au porteur', 'actions nominatives', 'parts privilégiées')

share_nominal_value.description: Par value or nominal value per share (e.g., '500 francs', 'cent francs par action')

capital_category.description: Classification of share capital (e.g., 'capital social', 'capital libéré', 'capital souscrit', 'capital autorisé')

country.description: Name of a country or nation (e.g., 'Belgique', 'France', 'Congo')

city.description: Name of a city, town, or commune (e.g., 'Bruxelles', 'Paris', 'Anvers')

street_address.description: Complete street address with number and street name (e.g., 'numéro 10 rue de la Paix', '25 avenue Louise')

building_name.description: Name of a building, property, estate, or landmark (e.g., 'Hôtel Métropole', 'Palais de Justice', 'Château de Laeken')

has_profession.description: Links a person to their profession or occupation

holds_corporate_position.description: Indicates that a person holds a corporate title or position within an organization

has_honorific_title.description: Links a person to their honorific or social title

resides_at_address.description: Indicates a person's specific residence address

resides_in_location.description: Indicates the city, region, or country where a person lives

owns_shares.description: Links a person to shares they own

represents.description: Indicates a person or an organization represents themselves as proxy for another person or organization

headquartered_at.description: Links an organization to its registered office address or headquarters location

has_legal_structure.description: Specifies an organization's legal structure or corporate form

has_business_purpose.description: Links an organization to its mission statement or business activity

has_duration.description: Specifies the duration or term of an organization, mandate, or agreement

has_capital.description: Links an organization to its share capital or capital structure

subject_to_procedure.description: Links an organization or deed to a legal procedure being performed

operates_in_location.description: Indicates the geographic location where an organization or office operates

dated.description: Links a meeting, deed, or event to its date

has_deposition_date.description: Links a deed to the date it was officially deposited at a registry or archive

has_registration_date.description: Links a deed to the date it was officially registered

has_publication_date.description: Links a deed to the date it was officially published in a gazette or registry

has_reference_number.description: Links a deed to its reference number or classification
